product_name: REI Carbon Power Lock Women's Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: Offering high-performance stability and power for diverse hiking terrains, REI Carbon Power Lock Women's Trekking Poles have a lightweight design and reliable, easily adjusted locking mechanisms. Women-specific design is lighter and shorter, and features a smaller grip than its unisex counterpart. Carbon fiber creates ultralight poles that damp vibration and retain strength over a wide temperature range. Power Lock external locking mechanisms are easy to use-even at low temperatures and when wearing gloves. REI Carbon Power Lock Women's Trekking Poles have EVA foam grips that are contoured to fit comfortably in your hands; adjustable, padded wrist straps add support. Poles are fitted with trekking baskets and durable tungsten carbide tips; included tip protectors are for travel/packing protection (not intended for hiking). Trekking baskets promote stability on soft terrain; baskets are easily twisted on and off if you want to replace them with snow baskets (sold separately).
short_description: Offering high-performance stability and power for diverse hiking terrains, REI Carbon Power Lock Women's Trekking Poles have a lightweight design and reliable, easily adjusted locking mechanisms.
